bio: A tiny part of Whisped Cream, an evil Yo-kai who was defeated by the Blasters. Only these little parts remain off of the moon.

soultimate.name: Blabber Belch
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 24% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' defense for a time.

name: Cream Puff
